cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuuzou

sentence.kanji: 最近ヨガをやる人が急増しています。
sentence.romaji: saikin yoga wo yaru hito ga kyuuzou shite imasu
sentence.english: Recently, there's been a sudden rise in the number of people doing yoga.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genjuusho

sentence.kanji: ここには現住所を書いてください。
sentence.romaji: koko ni ha genjuusho wo kaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please write your current address here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tousho

sentence.kanji: 当初の計画ではもっと早く終わるはずでした。
sentence.romaji: tousho no keikaku de ha moto hayaku owaru hazu deshita
sentence.english: According to the initial plan, it should have finished sooner.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiyakusho

sentence.kanji: 市役所で書類をもらって来たの。
sentence.romaji: shiyakusho de shorui wo morate kita no
sentence.english: I got the documents at the city office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sekin

sentence.kanji: 台風が接近していますね。
sentence.romaji: taifuu ga sekin shite imasu ne
sentence.english: A typhoon is approaching.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youga

sentence.kanji: 私は週に3本洋画を見ます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha shuu ni 3 bon youga wo mimasu
sentence.english: I watch three foreign films a week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaji

sentence.kanji: 母は毎日てきぱきと家事をしているよ。
sentence.romaji: haha ha mainichi tekipaki to kaji wo shite iru yo
sentence.english: My mother zips through housework every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katsuyou

sentence.kanji: 彼女はインターネットを活用しているの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha inta-neto wo katsuyou shite iru no
sentence.english: She makes use of the Internet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinji

sentence.kanji: 彼は人事を担当しているんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jinji wo tantou shite iru n da
sentence.english: He is in charge of personnel affairs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saka

sentence.kanji: 彼女は有名な作家です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha yuumei na saka desu
sentence.english: She is a well-known writer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuuyou

sentence.kanji: 彼は急用で帰りました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kyuuyou de kaerimashita
sentence.english: He went home on urgent businness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's migoto

sentence.kanji: 彼は見事なジャンプを見せたね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha migoto na janpu wo miseta ne
sentence.english: He showed us a splendid jump.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honshitsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は仕事の本質をよく理解しているわね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shigoto no honshitsu wo yoku rikai shite iru wa ne
sentence.english: He understands the essence of the work well.

cards.english: for some time, for the present
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toubun

sentence.kanji: 彼女は当分学校を休むそうです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha toubun gakou wo yasumu sou desu
sentence.english: It seems she'll be absent from the school for some time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukuriageru

sentence.kanji: それは彼女が作り上げた話です。
sentence.romaji: sore ha kanojo ga tsukuriageta hanashi desu
sentence.english: It's a story that she made up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinyou

sentence.kanji: 彼の言うことは信用できない。
sentence.romaji: kare no iu koto ha shinyou dekinai
sentence.english: I can't trust what he says.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ouyou

sentence.kanji: このレシピはいろいろ応用できます。
sentence.romaji: kono reshipi ha iroiro ouyou dekimasu
sentence.english: This recipe can be used in many ways.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kamoku

sentence.kanji: 今日は3科目のテストを受けたよ。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha sankamoku no tesuto wo uketa yo
sentence.english: I took exams for three subjects today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shizenkagaku

sentence.kanji: 姉は大学で自然科学を学んでいます。
sentence.romaji: ane ha daigaku de shizenkagaku wo manande imasu
sentence.english: My elder sister studies natural science at university.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ito

sentence.kanji: あなたの意図はよく分かりました。
sentence.romaji: anata no ito ha yoku wakarimashita
sentence.english: I understood your intention well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tounin

sentence.kanji: 当人は意外に平気なようね。
sentence.romaji: tounin ha igai ni heiki nayou ne 。
sentence.english: The person concerned seems to be unexpectedly cool.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiyou

sentence.kanji: 彼はかなり器用な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kanari kiyou na hito desu
sentence.english: He is very good with his hands.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's junkyuu

sentence.kanji: 新宿駅まで準急で行ったのよ。
sentence.romaji: shinjukueki made junkyuu de ita no yo
sentence.english: I went to Tokyo Station by the local express.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiyou

sentence.kanji: この製品を使用する前に、説明書をお読みください。
sentence.romaji: kono seihin wo shiyou suru mae ni setsumeisho wo oyomi kudasai
sentence.english: Please read the manual before using this product.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiryou

sentence.kanji: 図書館で資料を借りて来ました。
sentence.romaji: toshokan de shiryou wo karite kimashita
sentence.english: I borrowed some materials from the library.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seitou

sentence.kanji: これは正当な要求です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha seitou na youkyuu desu
sentence.english: This is a fair claim.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakusho

sentence.kanji: 役所で住民票をもらってきた。
sentence.romaji: yakusho de juuminhyou wo morate kita
sentence.english: I went to get a resident's card at the public office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soutou

sentence.kanji: 1ポンドは454グラムに相当します。
sentence.romaji: ichipondo ha 454 guramu ni soutou shimasu
sentence.english: One pound is equivalent to 454 grams.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rokuonテ-プ

sentence.kanji: インタビューはこの録音テープに入っています。
sentence.romaji: intabyu- ha kono rokuonte-pu ni haite imasu
sentence.english: The interview is recorded on this tape.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shakaikagaku

sentence.kanji: 社会科学の分野に関心があります。
sentence.romaji: shakaikagaku no bunya ni kanshin ga arimasu
sentence.english: I'm interested in the field of social sciences.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiyounin

sentence.kanji: 彼は使用人を首にしたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shiyounin wo kubi ni shita yo
sentence.english: He fired the servant.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rokuga

sentence.kanji: 好きな番組を録画したの。
sentence.romaji: suki na bangumi wo rokuga shita no
sentence.english: I recorded my favorite program.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atarimae

sentence.kanji: あなたの成績が下がったのは当たり前です。
sentence.romaji: anata no seiseki ga sagata no ha atarimae desu
sentence.english: No wonder your grades dropped.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's isakunen

sentence.kanji: 大学卒業は一昨年です。
sentence.romaji: daigaku sotsugyou ha isakunen desu
sentence.english: I graduated from university two years ago.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koyou

sentence.kanji: 彼はその会社と雇用契約を結んだの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sono kaisha to koyou keiyaku wo musunda no
sentence.english: He signed a contract of employment with the company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toukyoku

sentence.kanji: その事件については当局が調査しています。
sentence.romaji: sono jiken ni tsuite ha toukyoku ga chousa shite imasu
sentence.english: The authorities concerned are investigating the incident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mitasu

sentence.kanji: 彼は応募の条件を満たしていない。
sentence.romaji: kare ha oubo no jouken wo mitashite inai
sentence.english: He doesn't meet the application requirements.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youken

sentence.kanji: 用件をメモしておきました。
sentence.romaji: youken wo memo shite okimashita
sentence.english: I made a note of the matter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atari

sentence.kanji: 彼の予想は大当たりでした。
sentence.romaji: kare no yosou ha ooatari deshita
sentence.english: His prediction was spot on.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokorodokoro

sentence.kanji: この本はページが所々破れているね。
sentence.romaji: kono hon ha pe-ji ga tokorodokoro yaburete iru ne
sentence.english: The pages are torn here and there in this book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arasou

sentence.kanji: その2国は資源をめぐって争っています。
sentence.romaji: sono nikoku ha shigen wo megute arasote imasu
sentence.english: The two countries are competing for resources.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's monogoto

sentence.kanji: 彼はいつも物事を深く考えるの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha itsumo monogoto wo fukaku kangaeru no
sentence.english: He always thinks deeply about things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genryou

sentence.kanji: 石油はいろいろな製品の原料になります。
sentence.romaji: sekiyu ha iroiro na seihin no genryou ni narimasu
sentence.english: Petroleum is the raw material for various products.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tekiyou

sentence.kanji: この場合、保険が適用されますか。
sentence.romaji: kono baai hoken ga tekiyou saremasu ka
sentence.english: In this case, does insurance apply?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tekitou

sentence.kanji: その質問の適当な答えが見つかりません。
sentence.romaji: sono shitsumon no tekitou na kotae ga mitsukarimasen
sentence.english: I could not find an appropriate answer to the question.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiji

sentence.kanji: 環境問題に関する記事を読んだの。
sentence.romaji: kankyou mondai ni kansuru kiji wo yonda no
sentence.english: I read an article on environmental issues.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ooyuki

sentence.kanji: 10年振りの大雪です。
sentence.romaji: juunen buri no ooyuki desu
sentence.english: This is the heaviest snow in ten years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sayou

sentence.kanji: この薬は神経に作用します。
sentence.romaji: kono kusuri ha shinkei ni sayou shimasu
sentence.english: This medicine acts on the nerves.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikayoru

sentence.kanji: 彼に近寄らないで。
sentence.romaji: kare ni chikayoranai de
sentence.english: Don't go near him!

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuudan

sentence.kanji: 停電のため仕事を中断しました。
sentence.romaji: teiden no tame shigoto wo chuudan shimashita
sentence.english: We broke off our work due to the power failure.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dansui

sentence.kanji: 地震のために1週間、断水したの。
sentence.romaji: jishin no tame ni 1 shuukan dansui shita no
sentence.english: The water supply was cut off for a week due to the earthquake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yudan

sentence.kanji: 少しの油断が大きな事故につながります。
sentence.romaji: sukoshi no yudan ga ooki na jiko ni tsunagarimasu
sentence.english: A little carelessness can cause a big accident.
